    core grid

    mixins

    build-row

    @mixin build-row($display: block) { ... }
    View source

    Description

    Defines a row with display flex - falls back to display block. Uses negetive letter spacing to remove white space from children

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $display

    fallback if flex is not compatible

    		Stringblock

    build-grid

    @mixin build-grid() { ... }
    View source

    Description

    Defines a grid item and resets letter spacing between children

    Parameters

    None.

    Requires

    • [variable] special-font-stack
    • [variable] default-text-align

    build-column-gutter

    @mixin build-column-gutter() { ... }
    View source

    Description

    Build a gutter and resets letter spacing between children

    Parameters

    None.

    Requires

    • [variable] break-dir
    • [variable] column-gutter-breakpoint

    helpers

    mixins

    disable-if-flexbox-pure

    @mixin disable-if-flexbox-pure() { ... }
    View source

    Description

    Used to cleanup unwanted properties if flexbox fallback is not required

    Parameters

    None.

    Content

    This mixin allows extra content to be passed (through the @content directive).

    Requires

    • [variable] flexbox-compatibility-enabled

    flexbox-enabled-class

    @mixin flexbox-enabled-class() { ... }
    View source

    Parameters

    None.

    Content

    This mixin allows extra content to be passed (through the @content directive).

    Requires

    • [variable] flexbox-enable-class — [true]

    variables

    variables

    flexbox-enable-class

    $flexbox-enable-class: 'flexbox' !default;
    View source

    Description

    Used as class flag to enable flexbox properties Must be added to html tag either manaully or feature detect eg modernizr

    Used by

    • [mixin] flexbox-enabled-class

    View source

    Description

    Used to flag if flexbox compatibility

    Used by

    • [mixin] disable-if-flexbox-pure

    special-font-stack

    $special-font-stack: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif !default;
    View source

    Description

    Used to help define the whitespace between grid items

    Used by

    • [mixin] build-grid

    default-text-align

    $default-text-align: left !default;
    View source

    Description

    The default grid item text-align reset

    global-name-space

    $global-name-space: '' !default;
    View source

    Description

    Use to namespace the whole grid-system.

    container-name

    $container-name: 'container' !default;
    View source

    Description

    Wrapper name to create a centering div. Uses margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto

    breakpoints

    $breakpoints: (
  'small': 480px,
  'medium': 768px,
  'large': 1024px,
  'xlarge': 1180px
) !default;
    View source

    Description

    The include-media breakpoints. Loop over these breakpoints and pass keys into grid classes

    break-dir

    $break-dir: '>=' !default;
    View source

    Description

    The default include-media breakpoint direction

    '<'

    Description

    Sets the max-width of the container class

    Description
